Room.Name: Overland Drive/Golden Dolphin Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Overland Drive and Golden Dolphin Way.
Room.LongDescription: Overland Drive heads off to the north, eventually turning to the west as it reaches the Necropolis and the Manor of Natasha de Allisk, two of the most frightening places in Oceancrest. Golden Dolphin way runs east and west, running parallel to the large City Walls that protect the city from threats of attack by orcs and other barbarians.
